entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
